name: Hello Implementation
description: Implementation of large systems. In mainly Java\Springboot but we can see other languages\frmeworks like python and JS Credit several of the high level desgins come from HelloInterview

name: Quantica
description: A real-time streaming pipeline that consumes Binance market data, publishes events to Kafka, enriches them with analytics and anomaly detection, and generates AI-powered markdown news reports.

name: N2
description: A lightweight embeddable in-memory JSON document store for Java, supporting CRUD operations, JsonPath querying, schema validation, and an optional web console with Spring Boot integration.

name: Hello Technologies
description: A hands-on project that implements simplified versions of popular technologies like Kafka, NoSQL, and relational databases to demonstrate their inner workings and enhance developer understanding.

name: Glowing Octo Invention
description: A Java-based framework for fuzzing and testing Ethereum smart contracts using Web3j, supporting both local contract simulations and deployed contracts, with oracle checks and detailed fuzzing reports.

name: EtherIndex
description: A Spring Boot application that connects to the Worldchain Sepolia testnet, providing real-time block tracking, resilient data ingestion, event-driven architecture, and a REST API for indexed blockchain data.
